entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 1400 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
